column4: all, I can't find 3D Windows in my CompizConfig Manager after moving from 9.10 to 10.04.
make sure simple ccsm is installed
I have advanced CCSM...
never heard of that one maybe new to ubuntu 10.04
sorry, Advanced Desktop Effects Settings (ccsm)
I will install simple ccsm
now I have CCSM and simple CCSM.  Still can't find the 3D option.  in 9.10 I only needed CCSM
ok now go to system\apperance\visual effects and select custom
already checked that out after install. none of the tabs give me the 3D option
CCSM actually has a lot more options available then simple CCSM
duh.... my bad let me go do that now
what exactly are you trying to use in compiz?
when I rotate the cude desktop, my windows don't float over the cube anymore like in 9.10.  It's trivial I know, but I really liked it
did u make sure rotate cube was still checked ?
of course
ok u'd be amazed lol
it rotates just fine, the windows just don't have that hover effect
totally understand, I work in a service desk
make sure you have animations checked and go into simple ccsm and check settings it's weird sometimes they conflict each other but have to have them both to work
I have played with that option already... still no go
I'm pretty green, only been playing with ubuntu for 4 years
